body: Daniele at The East Asia Gazette analyzed the "state of suicides in Japan" [en]. The post reads like a short essay on the sociological and cultural causes of suicide in one of the country with the highest suicide rates in the world. The blogger also reflected on the alarming statistics recently released by the National Police Agency and the role of the media.

title: Japan: Yearning for death
